title: How to Make a Donut Ice Cream Sandwich

steps.headline: Thaw the ice cream.
steps.description: Remove the ice cream from the freezer and allow to thaw for a couple minutes. Keep in mind you want the ice cream to be soft enough to scoop not watery.

steps.headline: Put the chocolate chips into a bowl.
steps.description: Open up a bag of chocolate chips and pour it into a large microwave safe bowl.

steps.headline: Melt the chocolate.
steps.description: Pop the chocolate chips into the microwave for intervals of 30 seconds until completely melted and allow to cool.

steps.headline: Cut the donut.
steps.description: Using a knife, slice the donut in half horizontally. You should now have 2 slices if done properly.

steps.headline: Add ice cream.
steps.description: Scoop some ice cream onto the freshly cut donut, and place the other donut slice on top.

steps.headline: Dip the donut into chocolate.
steps.description: After the chocolate has cooled down, dip half of the donut into the melted chocolate.

steps.headline: Freeze the donuts.
steps.description: Place the donuts onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Pop the sandwich into the freezer for 20 minutes or until frozen.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Place the ice cream sandwich onto a clean plate and dig in!

text: Thaw the ice cream. Remove the ice cream from the freezer and allow to thaw for a couple minutes. Keep in mind you want the ice cream to be soft enough to scoop not watery. Put the chocolate chips into a bowl. Open up a bag of chocolate chips and pour it into a large microwave safe bowl. Melt the chocolate. Pop the chocolate chips into the microwave for intervals of 30 seconds until completely melted and allow to cool. Cut the donut. Using a knife, slice the donut in half horizontally. You should now have 2 slices if done properly. Add ice cream. Scoop some ice cream onto the freshly cut donut, and place the other donut slice on top. Dip the donut into chocolate. After the chocolate has cooled down, dip half of the donut into the melted chocolate. Freeze the donuts. Place the donuts onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Pop the sandwich into the freezer for 20 minutes or until frozen. Serve. Place the ice cream sandwich onto a clean plate and dig in!
